## rds-progress-circle Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                 | Type     | Default             |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------------------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | Sets the label for the progress circle.                                                     | `string` | `'Progress Circle'` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Set the size of the progress circle, default is md. Available Options are: sm, md and lg    | `string` | `'md'`              |
| `value`  | `value`   | Sets the percentage value to be displayed as well as the amount of the circle to be filled. | `string` | `'0'`               |


----------------------------------------------

_Built for Resilience Design System @ FM Global_
